price: Has cumplido con lo que viste [en tus sueños]. Así recompenso a los que hacen el bien".
arabic: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qad ṣaddaqta al-ru'yā innā kadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
